version_description:
- A new Daily Rewards system has been implemented. Collect them every day to get awesome rewards!
- Your best astronaut will stay in your Space Centers giving you tips and tricks about the game and the Galaxy itself.
- New rocket models have been added!
- Jupiter’s Space Station is ready. Keep launching rockets to reach this base!
- Lots of visual improvements and bug fixes.

- A new Space Rocket has been implemented on Mars!
- Titan’s Space Station is ready. Keep launching rockets to reach this base!
- Minor bug fixes and balance tweaks.

- Income Boosts have been added to the game! Get them in the store or as a Daily Reward to power up your Space Centers!
- Spending and earning Star Credits now accumulate value in the Piggy Bank. Be sure to check it out in the shop!
- Triton’s Space Center is available. Launch more and more rockets to reach this mysterious moon!
- Balance Tweaks.
- Minor bug fixes.

+ New Leaders System is now available.
+ Bug fixes.

+ Minor improvements
+ Bug fixes

+ Game Center Achievements and Leaderboards are available! Connect your account and try to get them all!
+ New Leaders from the Space Station are now available!
+ Added new Video Gems Researches to the Research Center!
+ A progression meter now shows the Missions progression in your Space Centers!
+ Bug fixes
+ Bug Fixes

+ Game Center Achievements and Leaderboards are available! Connect your account and try to get them all!
+ New Leaders from the Space Station are now available!
+ Added new Video Gems Researches to the Research Center!
+ A progression meter now shows the Missions progression in your Space Centers!

+ Game Center Achievements and Leaderboards are available! Connect your account and try to get them all!
+ New Leaders from the Space Station are now available!
+ Added new Video Gems Researches to the Research Center!
+ A progression meter now shows the Missions progression in your Space Centers!
+ Bug fixes

+ You’ll now get a crate for each launch! Keep sending rockets to space to get more leader cards!
+ The shop is now updated! Check out the new look and the awesome packs to help your space exploration!
+ Bug fixes and performance improvements.

+ You can now compare your progress with your friends on Facebook!
+ Performance improvements.
+ Bug fixes.
+ Performance improvements and minor bug fixes

+ Resources launched from your Space Centers build the Hypercube and award you items!
+ The Hypercube awards you Skill Shards, used to level up your Leaders Skills!
+ Quality of life improvements and bug fixes

+ The Galaxy has been updated. Explore the awesome new planets!
+ The Resource Missions are now available in the Challenge Center! Launch rockets and their resources to claim great items!
+ The Star Coins production is now at the top of your screen!
+ Minor bug fixes.

+ User Experience improvements
+ Bug fixes and improvements

+ New batteries are now available in the shop!
+ Introducing the Daily Offer and the Mystery Battery in the shop!
+ Trade Space Cash and Video Gems in the shop!
+ This version contains a series of bug fixes and performance improvements.

+ New languages have been added to the game!
+ New features have been added to the game!
+ We have updated the leaders visuals!
+ New minigames are now available!
+ We have added more exclusive items in the shop! Check it out!
+ This version contains a series of bug fixes and performance improvements.

Thanks for playing!
